post:
ScopeHosts 10th anniversary celebration. We are celebrating 10 years of journey in hosting industry with great achievements and great response from all our customers. We feel delighted for being a part of you all and our motto is to serve the best. It is not just our celebration but it is a celebration for all who have been a part of the company through all these years.

As a token of thank you for being a part of our company, we are doing a small give away!!

Exclusive Giveaway Offer.
Valid from Dec 1st - 5th, 2018 ​

Here is Something To Prove To You That You Are Always In Our Minds. You mean a lot to us and we think about your contribution always.

Features you will get with your FREE VPS:
========================================
FREE Migration
FREE 1 IPv4 and 5 IPv6
Full Control Access
Anytime Money Back Guarantee
Data Security
Easily Scalable

Ho-ho-ho! Giveaways For All!​

Terms and Conditions
1. This Giveaway is open for all
2. Like and Share FACEBOOK Giveaway Post
3. Need to Add in footer "Powered & Hosted By SCOPEHOSTS.COM" with a follow link to: https://www.scopehosts.com/vps-hosting
4. No hidden rules
5. Giveaway is for 10 members only

For more Anniversary offers check here ScopeHosts Offers
For more updated offers Follow Us on Facebook & Twitter for Updates

**********It is not about being the best, but it is about being better than yesterday!!! Happy 10th anniversary scopehosts**********
